Posts.Content: sensitivehrt wrote: I had a BMX on May 6th for a stage 1 grade 2  7mm tumor with no reconstruction.  Met with the MO 6 weeks post surgery.  Was given the recommendation of 10 years of tamoxifen. My pathology after surgery was ER+ 8% and PR and Her-.  My MO called yesterday with results of Onco type test.  High intermediate range of 30.  MO said my pathology changed though.  I am now ER-, PR +.  Said she would be recommending chemo and we will discuss at my appointment that I have coming up on Tuesday.  I've been researching some of the older posts with similar stats and have seen people state that chemo should start within 8-12 weeks after surgery (I am coming up on that quickly).  Still not sure what I'm going to do, have to wait to go over report. Any thoughts, comments or suggestions would be appreciated. Dx 3/7/2016, IDC, Left, <1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, ER+/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/6/2016 Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 8/9/2016 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Onco type score of 30 sensitivehrt Meow13
